		LL n,m;

		LL ret;
		if(n==1 || m==1)

			ret=max(m,n);//<<endl;

		else if(n==m)
		{
			ret = n;			//<<endl;

		} else {

			LL g = __gcd(n - 1, m - 1);
			LL a = (n - 1) / g;
			LL b = (m - 1) / g;
			g=__gcd(a,b);
			//cout<<a<<" "<<b<<end;;
			LL k = (a * b) / g;
			LL ar = k / b;
			LL ac = k / a;
			//cout<<ar<<" "<<ac<<endl;
			ret=min(n/ar + (n/ar==0 && n>ar),m/ac + (m/ac==0 && m>ac));
			ret++;
		}
